title: Token for The Lawbearer temple
contents: text | You are a trustworthy member of The Lawbearer temple

title: Unknown pink pendant
contents: text | Drop from a little girl at Stilben.

title: Ring of warmth
contents: text | While wearing this ring, you have resistance to cold damage. In addition, you and everything you wear and carry are unharmed by temperatures as low as - 50 degrees Fahrenheit.
